docs.snippet: A survey of the shipping lines here in the last week disclosed that the defense demands made by the government on American flag shipping and the withdrawal of all but a few foreign-owned vessels from the transatlantic lanes have reduced facilities...
docs.lead_paragraph: A survey of the shipping lines here in the last week disclosed that the defense demands made by the government on American flag shipping and the withdrawal of all but a few foreign-owned vessels from the transatlantic lanes have reduced facilities for sea transport from New York to a fleet of fewer than fifty passenger liners.
docs.abstract: N Y-Western Hemisphere passenger ship service surveyed

headline.main: Fewer Than 50 Passenger Liners Now Available for Ocean Travel; Survey Shows Vast Cut in Facilities Here, Exclusive of Coastwise Vessels -- Situa- tion Due to Exigencies of the War

docs.snippet: MEXICO CITY -- More and better roads, more and better hotels, uniform traffic laws, fewer and less complicated passports, customs and other border regulations -- all these may soon come for the visitor in Latin America as the result of two big travel...
docs.lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY -- More and better roads, more and better hotels, uniform traffic laws, fewer and less complicated passports, customs and other border regulations -- all these may soon come for the visitor in Latin America as the result of two big travel congresses recently held in this Mexican capital.
docs.abstract: Inter-Amer congs plan to aid tourists

headline.main: NEW TRAVEL GOALS; Nations of Both Americas in Broad Plan To Ease Visits Throughout Hemisphere WIDE TRAVEL AIMS IN AMERICAS
WOODCUTS FROM LANDS TO THE SOUTH

docs.snippet: The net amount of gold required to put Latin America on a gold basis for its post-war trade with the United States and at the same time establish the dollar as a basis of standard value would be $200,000,000 to $250,000,000, in the opinion of D....
docs.lead_paragraph: The net amount of gold required to put Latin America on a gold basis for its post-war trade with the United States and at the same time establish the dollar as a basis of standard value would be $200,000,000 to $250,000,000, in the opinion of D. Stewart Iglehart, president of the Grace Line and W.R. Grace Co., international mercantile shipping house.

headline.main: URGES GOLD BASE IN LATIN AMERICA; D.S. Iglehart, Head of Grace Line, Proposes Dollar as Standard of Value.

docs.snippet: The Whitney Museum of American Art opened yesterday afternoon an exhibition of children's paintings produced in classes conducted by Augustus Peck. For the preview reception this work filled the walls not only of the smaller galleries numbered 9 and...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Whitney Museum of American Art opened yesterday afternoon an exhibition of children's paintings produced in classes conducted by Augustus Peck. For the preview reception this work filled the walls not only of the smaller galleries numbered 9 and 10, on the second floor of the museum, but also those of the large Gallery 8, adjoining.

headline.main: ART OF CHILDREN PUT ON EXHIBITION; Reception, With a Preview of Paintings, Given in Galleries of Whitney Museum ACES ARE FROM 10 TO 15 Strong Color Prevalent in the Display From Classes of Augustus Peck
